Package:
Org Limits Unmanaged package for visualforce page that shows a dashboard-like layout of the current usage of all things limited within salesforce. Github repo available at https://github.com/jthurst01/OrgLimits. Remember: - Only works it you assign permission set to the users you want - you must enable your orgs api url. Search in quick find in the setup menu for 'remote site settings' and add your url. (ex. https://c.instance.visual.force.com) - Visit the Tab 'Org Limits' once package is installed, permission set to your user, and your salesforce api url is enabled.
Built by Jay Hurst. Packaged by Jack Ziesing.
